name: Awesome Snails Race
description:
Don't you agree with a partner? Are you too lazy to choose your own decisions? 

Customize your own snail and challenge other snails in an awesome race!

Reviews:

"It's like heads or tails but with cool snails" 9.3/10 - OGN

"Snails with hat? No need to say more" 10/10 - GamePoint

Music:

Endless Way - SilentCrafter
Initial D - Deja Vu
